rationale: The segment contains advice/safety measures, not an intensifier/comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual information about mitigation/safety ('will also kill any viruses') without high-potency framing.
No moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment provides information about cooking but does not contain an explicit calming cue from a source or author.
The segment does not contain a minimiser token ('only', 'just', 'few', etc.) combined with an explicit scale contrast ('out of thousands', 'among millions').
